column1: What is the current situation of bed bugs in HK hotels? I know there is a general problem but is it on the increase just now? Thanks
Have not heard of bed bugs being an issue in Hong Kong.
>>bed bugs in HK hotels[...] is a general problem[citation needed]
I wouldn't have heard of such a problem if I didn't read about it here ...midges and mosquitoes out here in the far New Territories, yes, but bed bugs?
Apparantly, there may be an epidemic on its way;scmp.com/lifestyle/health/article/2098227/hoâ€¦
Thank you for your responses - so may be a problem, but not yet really serious......
Have not heard of this issue previously. I wouldn't be concerned at this point.
Have not had this as an issue in the various hotels I'very been in. Check the TA reviews for your hotel and do a search for bugs.
